title: I am lost for words
text: They are disgusting vile scum , I could quite happily turn there faces to mush . jogger1976 said: I'd like to think I'm a reasonable and rational person. And I certainly don't advocate violence or vigilantism. However, on this occasion, I think I'd actually quite enjoy seeing the utter fking scum who perpetrated this getting a damn good kicking. http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/find-who-this... What sort of world do we live in where people think it's acceptable to do this to a frail pensioner, a man who has served his country and was apparently a pillar of his community?Latest news is that two 19 year old have been arrested and bailed. If it's them let's hope they meet some equally nasty sorts on the inside.
